doc:
Serge Avedikian https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serge_Avedikian 0 Serge Avedikian (Armenian: Սերժ Ավետիքյան; born 1 December 1955), sometimes credited as Serje Avetikian, is an Armenian-French film and theatre actor, director, writer and producer, winner of Cannes Festival prize. Serge_Avedikian ( Armenian : Սերժ_Ավետիքյան ; born_1_December_1955 ) , sometimes_credited as Serje_Avetikian , is an_Armenian-French_film_and_theatre_actor , director , writer_and_producer , winner of Cannes_Festival_prize .
